attributes.action: Replace Council Tax in Scotland with a Local Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners pay the same amount in Council Tax as they would pay if they were still working even although they have, in most cases, a much lower income. They, along with other householders of modest means, pay a greater percentage of their income in Council Tax than high earners. A tax on income, rather than on the size of a home, would be fairer.
